inra.ijpb.plugins

Class ChamferDistanceMapPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • inra.ijpb.plugins.ChamferDistanceMapPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.gui.DialogListener, ij.plugin.filter.ExtendedPlugInFilter, ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter

    public class ChamferDistanceMapPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.filter.ExtendedPlugInFilter, ij.gui.DialogListener
    Compute distance map, with possibility to choose chamfer weights, result type, and to normalize result or not.
    Author:
    dlegland

      • exec

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.Object[] exec(ij.ImagePlus image,
                                           java.lang.String newName,
                                           float[] weights,
                                           boolean normalize)
        Deprecated. 
        Computes the distance propagation from the boundary of the particles. Background is assumed to be 0.
        Parameters:
        image - the binary image to process
        newName - the name of the new image
        weights - the array of weights in orthogonal, diagonal and eventually chessknight moves directions
        normalize - boolean flag indicating whether resulting map should be normalized
        Returns:
        an array of objects containing the new name, and the result image

      • exec

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.Object[] exec(ij.ImagePlus image,
                                           java.lang.String newName,
                                           short[] weights,
                                           boolean normalize)
        Deprecated. 
        Compute the distance propagation from the boundary of the white particles.
        Parameters:
        image - the binary image to process
        newName - the name of the new image
        weights - the array of weights in orthogonal, diagonal and eventually chessknight moves directions
        normalize - boolean flag indicating whether resulting map should be normalized
        Returns:
        an array of objects containing the new name, and the result image
